extendedInfo.description: Have fun by attempting to answer the THOUSANDs of questions in Trivia Quiz!Compare your scores with other playerâs around the world on the Top List and collect Rewards and Achievements!In Trivia Quiz you have to answer 10 randomly selected questions from our huge and constantly updating database within a limited time frame.

reviews.title: Nice quiz
reviews.comment: Works fine for me. Nice variety of questions and not much repetition yet.
reviews.author: Juhani Tamminen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open...
reviews.comment: When I try to open the app it says \"force close\" and won\'t let me open it.

reviews.comment: Needs lots of work it won\'t even let me play it just says force close :(

reviews.title: POPUP ADS WHEN NOT RUNNING
reviews.comment: Push notification bar advertising that you cannot disable! I hope this application dies in a fire. Programmers: I don\'t care how much money you\'re getting from this, it\'s not worth it. People hate this sh*t, and I\'m never again downloading, using, or recommending a single application of yours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too many American questions. Plus, I\'ve found that a fair few of the answers that its gives are actually wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many wrong answers!
reviews.comment: There are too many wrong answers in this quiz. Also some questions are worded and linked to previous questions. Unfortunately as they come up randomly sometimes they don\'t follow the questions they are meant to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I enjoy play the game plus I learn a lot from it. The only reason why it\'s not a 5 star game for me is that it always force closes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now unusable.
reviews.comment: The new \"must divert to the market before launching\"ads make it unusable. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malware!
reviews.comment: Don\'t install! Getting unwanted notifications after adding this (e.g. \" you have won an iPad-click here..) Can\'t uninstall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Intrusive ads
reviews.comment: Highly intrusive ads before every single game make this unplayable. First ad I\'ve ever wanted to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Takes up far to much CPU time. Battery draining

reviews.title: Steer Clear
reviews.comment: Uses Airpush Hijacks your phone to send constant ads for crap software. Doesn\'t allow you to turn it off. Be warned, steer clear.

reviews.title: Useless!!!
reviews.comment: It didn\'t come it with anything the screen went black.
